Name: Majesty Metals and Manufacturing
Details: Majesty Metals and Manufacturing is a long-standing industrial producer specializing in combat vehicles and BattleMechs, with major facilities on Canopus IV and Dunianshire. Originally focused on civilian production, it expanded into military manufacturing and even DropShip construction. Despite resource depletion on Canopus IV, the company continued production by importing materials and adding new lines through outside investment, maintaining its role as a key supplier of heavy arms.
